title: Laid out in the Lobby
description: Having finally come to his place of rest and obtained a good night cap, the Detective settled into bed in his hotel room. He had just gotten comfortable when, to his chagrin and dismay, he heard a scream. Throwing on enough clothing to be respectable, the Detective trudged down the stairs to find exactly what he'd come to expect at this point - a body, which happened to dead and surrounded by other living bodies who would all claim to be innocent. Oh well, time to open up the notebook.

personList.name: Bellboy Oh Geez That's A Long Name That I Didn't Catch
personList.description: Bellboy is just the official title. He does basically anything around here.

personList.name: Night Auditor Jennifer
personList.description: A friendly voice doesn't mean an unwillingness to defenestrate rude guests.
personList.statement: I'm sure General Manager Phill would do anything to placate a guest.

personList.name: General Manager Phill
personList.description: He makes the big bucks, hence the fancy car with a golden PRNDL

personList.name: Doorman... Something
personList.description: No one seems to know this guy's name. What's with the barcode tattoo?
personList.statement: I was at the Breakfast Buffet.

weaponList.name: Blueberry Muffin
weaponList.description: Delicious, crumbly, and oddly hefty. Probably shouldn't be thrown around carelessly.

weaponList.name: Briefcase
weaponList.description: So many very important papers in here. Top Secret of course.

weaponList.name: Room Key
weaponList.description: With enough force, you could probably use this little card to cut something open.

weaponList.name: Mop
weaponList.description: Normally this is just used for cleaning up spilled milk.

locationList.name: Stairs
locationList.description: A beautiful marble staircase. That's what the brochure pictured. It's actually just concrete in a normal stairwell.

locationList.name: Front Desk
locationList.description: It's got every office supply you can think of except for a decent chair.

locationList.name: Lounge
locationList.description: It's so comfortable and quiet. You could rest here forever.

locationList.name: Breakfast Buffet
locationList.description: You'd expect to see some food here. Then again, it is midnight.

cluesList: Someone with no hair carried a Blueberry Muffin
The shortest suspect was at the Front Desk
Crumbs of baking ingredients were found on the Stairs
The briefcase was not found among office supplies
The person who wanted to defend themself did not have a mop.
Whoever wanted to rob the victim was in a place you would expect to find food.
A weapon useful for work was ironically found in the lounge.
The Doorman wanted to complete a job
hint: The Oracle had foreseen that the Room Key would be at the Front Desk.

resolution.resolutionText: As the Detective looked around, he realized that he there was only one person standing there to appreciate his work - the doorman. Everyone else had been killed while he was explaining. The Doorman quickly donned the General Manager's clothes before turning to the detective and pulling a fish out of the briefcase. The Detective's heart jumped into high gear as he immediately put together what was about to happen - it would be the Hitman in the Lobby with the Fish. Why? To silence all witnesses.
